content: Regarding our financial outlook for 2022, we continue to expect revenue growth in 2022 of 51% to 60%, over 2021, resulting in total revenues of $25.5 million to $27 million and expect to be able to leverage the investments we’re making to get our data factory and software platform running to scale, and to begin realizing the benefits of our revenue growth in the form of improved adjusted EBITDA loss during the second half of 2022, while achieving a positive adjusted EBITDA contribution in the second half of 2023.
